website_summaries.verdict: Though it may take little time and effort to master its functions, this quadcopter is an investment for the serious hobbyist who wants all the bells and whistles.
pros: Distances itself from the pack with its state-of-the-art technology that includes GPS and return home function and superior camera that's capable of taking HD quality selfies, live video and more
cons: Instructions and customer service could be better

website_summaries.verdict: The best budget option for a fully-featured drone capable of accurate Follow Me tracking.
pros: Comes with a high quality 720P HD camera on a rotating track for cinematic shots
GPS guidance allows the drone to return to a designated area automatically
cons: 4 rotating blades lack any kind of guard to prevent damage from surrounding obstacles

customer_reviews.title: Very stable, easy to fly!
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION – Holy Stone recommends the HS100 drone is for those at least 16 years old, and I agree. My purpose in this 1-minute video is to show how easy this drone is to fly. My 8-year-old great-granddaughter demonstrates how stable the GPS feature works, making the drone a pleasure to fly. My instructions to her were to “Take-off, fly straight out over the field, move it around some, bring it back, land it.” This is just her second time flying the drone (1st flight was immediately before this flight). She is using only the joysticks. She is 8, I am 75 next month, and we enjoy sharing family time together, and flying the HS100.
customer_reviews.author: Great-Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: I really do not know where those good reviews came from?!?!
customer_reviews.text: In one word it is GARBAGE. In detail: propeller guards attached with screws that kept spinning so there is no "meat" to hold the tread. 5 mins into the flight. Left side of the joystick stop responding, so we were able to go up, down and turn around. Not able to move forward or backwards. 10 mins later landed and the sign for the battery turned red. To top the "excitment" we replaced the battery in the drone and try to fly again, but without any luck because the remote battery died.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a Christmas gift and over 2 months later it still hasn't flown. Manufacturer says the app will not work because it is being updated. If it isn't ready to fly it should not be flown. I paid $300 for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Howell

customer_reviews.title: I received the drones, charged the drone and transmitter ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the drones, charged the drone and transmitter batteries. Started setting the iphone and after the setup it shows the transmitter battery very low. It would not respond because of the low transmitter battery. Tried to charge the transmitter battery but after less than 1 minute the green light comes on showing that it is charged. Took it outside and tried to start to fly. The transmitter battery still shows low. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Froy

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE OF MY PREVIOUS FEEDBACK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money or at least read the 1 star rating comments!!! Assemblies and flew almost once!!! One motor quit running. They offered a replacement motor and change our instructions. I returned it as I feel a good product should last more than 1/2 of one flight!!!! As I said, read all the 1 star comments!!!!!!! UPDATE: Since the above rating the supplier has sent me another drone. I must say I am much more satisfied with the new one. So far it has functioned as advertised and I am looking forward to getting more proficient with it's use. Instructions are somewhat fuzzy but with a little study they can be followed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A step up
customer_reviews.text: After owning a few holy stone drones. And dji phantoms. I can say this one is designed more like the phantom 4 series. Pro. Good camera in day light. Very bright light to help you know which direction to point at. Feels strong. It's has some of the features that $500 and above drones has. It's a step up from there other models. Con: it can't be flown out of sight. The remote phone holder feels cheap. Night flying to capture videos needs to improve. If this drone drop down to $200 I think that would be the sweet price point.
customer_reviews.author: Tony k

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is Great!
customer_reviews.text: 0nly flew twice and motor died. But customer service jumped right in with a new product to totally replace my damaged item. Holy Stone's service staff was prompt and quick to response to the problem with a different product that worked very nicely .Everything is good now. I am enjoying learning how to operate. Thank you again Holy Stone for your quick response.
customer_reviews.author: Battling B

customer_reviews.title: very loose connection between remote and drone
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty costly drone. Its performs OK as long as it stays connected to the remote. Pictures and video qualoty just OK. The wi-fi connection between the drone and remote is very unreliable too. It had lost connection few times but used to return to home... once it lost the connection with remote and flew away and was never found..what a loss... not worth this price at all...never recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic drone
customer_reviews.text: I loved learning with this drone. I did a review previously with a little video I guess amazon lost it. This is very easy to use, the camera is ok. The drone is pretty tough...it took some knocks but it just kept at it. I am a believer of Holy Stone for value, quality and the customer service is by far better than most companies!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Fly for 5 min no more
customer_reviews.text: Fly for 5 min,i purchase two extra batteries with the same issues,came in a nice 📦,excellent customer service but i wasnt happy with it,ppl who gave fake reviews as a favor they are blinding new customers please be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Monssif

customer_reviews.title: Battery not  charging
customer_reviews.text: The drone seems awesome but I only got to use it once. The second time the battery didn't hold a charge and it nearly crashed and broke. Now the battery will not hold a charge at all and I guess I'm going to need to order another battery or return this. If you don't have a battery problem I imagine this is a good drone.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy! I’ve been owning this for four months and it is nothing but problems! Seems like I can’t fly more than 3 flights before the battery is dead on the transmitter. So it was another waste of money spent on extra batteries for the drone. I’ve never crashed it. It flys good. Just seems like every time I try to fly, there is a battery problem. Total waste of money. Don’t waste yours. It’s not all that! I’m pretty sure the 5 star reviews are fabricated!
customer_reviews.author: Mikel John

customer_reviews.title: Holy Stone Drone HS 100:  Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part was "orienting" the drone, other than that it was a piece of cake. I had mine flying after a quick purusal of the instructions and showing my brother what needed to be done. Great drone. the video was great and made it more fun since you could watch yourself. I followed my sister around for a couple of minutes and had both of us laughing hard. She loved watching the video afterwards. My dad already said he was going to buy another for himself. Love the drone. Only down side is battery life, but the trade off is worth it. Will defiantly buy again and will buy an upgraded Holy Stone in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Take it or Leave it

customer_reviews.title: I had difficulty calibrating the compass in my garage but it calibrated outdoors just fine. Also my iPhone would not register battery status
customer_reviews.text: I am 73 years old and this is my first R/C Drone. I found that if the instructions are followed precisely, the drone will communicate with the controller perfectly. I had difficulty calibrating the compass in my garage but it calibrated outdoors just fine. Also my iPhone would not register battery status. Customer service advised me to pair the controller to the drone before connecting the phone to the drone Wi-Fi. That worked. I'm rating the HS100 five stars due to outstanding customer service and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G.

customer_reviews.title: Holystone HS100 Review
customer_reviews.text: The reason I rate it 4 stars is because it decided to fly off uncontrollably upon pushing the one touch take off button. That resulted in me having to replace one of the plastic gears (which they provide extra of). So far, the uncontrollable fly off has only happened once, so It may have just been bad GPS data or compass interference. Will update if it happens again. The camera is just OK, but not great by any means. It's to be expected in this price range. Overall, it works as advertised. Great starter drone for people getting into flying.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Unit flies fine but the controller has built in recharge battery and ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit flies fine but the controller has built in recharge battery and it won't charge. Looks like most negative reviews have the same issue. Would the been a 5 start but they need to fix that problem first.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price but far from great.
customer_reviews.text: Range is nowhere near 500 meters. Looses stability and can crash when descending. Camera is good but it is hard to see anything on a phone screen when flying. Batteries have a short flight time - maybe 10 mins. Remote looses connection to the drone often. A better antenna would be nice. Specs are exaggerated by the company but it is a decent beginner drone. The first one had a GPS malfunction and flew away when I hit the RTH button. Amazon replaced it and I have not had any GPS problems with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Rob U

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.  I’d spend a little more to get something better.
customer_reviews.text: I give two stars because it flies reasonably stably and is not too hard to control. That’s all the good I have to say... Flight time was less than 10 minutes, not the 12-15 promised Instructions are written by someone who doesn’t know English or used google translate. Horribly written and difficult to understand. The app is fairly worthless as once the unit gets up in the air, it loses connection with the phone. The camera appears to be controllable (steerable) but there’s no mention to that in the app I was very excited to get this and then was unfortunately disappointed. I will be returning it as it doesn’t come close to doing what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box adult assembly required. Then when it's all together and the charged battery is inserted it just doesn't work. I replaced it because I thought the one I got must be defective then the replacement didn't work either. I returned it for the refund and uninstalled the useless app.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor JAM

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Drone.  Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice drone and easy to learn to operate. One button takeoff and one button landing. I have heard of some drones getting lost due to getting out of range and flying away. You don't have to worry about that with this one. It will return home if battery gets low or it gets out of range. There is also a "follow me" feature. I did a good bit of research before selecting this model and I have been pleased with it so far. Video quality is very good. I had a few questions about it so I contacted Holy Stone customer service. They were very responsive and helpful. I was impressed with their patience and knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Captkirk

customer_reviews.title: Nice for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Nice drone, flight time is much less than advertised. I was glad I ordered a second battery. Camera image is very clear but won’t record to the SD card. Contacted the company and had at least four different people reply and had to email the same information to each one. Tried all of their solutions and none worked. Had one representative tell me they had cameras in stock and would send a replacement. Another said maybe they had one. That’s been over a month and haven’t heard anything and get no response. Unit is worth the money, after sale customer service is lacking. Three stars based solely on customer service.
customer_reviews.author: tcw

customer_reviews.title: This has been a lot of fun and easier than expected to fly
customer_reviews.text: I've had this drone for 3 weeks now and I'm happy with my purchase. I have flown it in appx 12MPH winds and it will hover in place without me having to manage it. The pictures/video it takes are good. Surprisingly stable when I'm not trying to fly it and video at the same time. Videos while in motion are good but you could tell there was some wind (it was actually a lot of wind). I haven't had trouble flying it. The controls are straightforward and the automated launch/land functions are great. Overall I'm very happy with the drone and would recommend it for beginners and also for more experienced flyers.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hill

customer_reviews.title: Like it camera is neat
customer_reviews.text: I had to get my nephew to help me. I’m older so some of this I wasn’t sure about. My nephew has his drone License and flew them for his last job. He said it was a really good beginners. So like I said, I figured it out after he showed me, once he did it wasn’t bad but little difficult for an older person to fly. Kids that use joysticks and play video games they all seem to do very well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry T Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Holy Stone HS100. Get one yourself!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase! It arrived quickly and well packaged. If you cannot find the propellers, they are hidden underneath the styrofoam insert. In fact, the seller emailed me about this personally. The manual is pretty straightforward and easy to understand. I took my time perusing it as I didn't want to crash the drone straight away. The remote controller easily holds my Galaxy S9 and is very solid. In fact, I was pleasantly surprised by the overall good quality of the parts. Definitely a lot of bang for the buck. I just love how easy this drone to fly is. It is also surprisingly quiet. I look forward to having a lot of fun with this drone!
customer_reviews.author: Olaf Meier

customer_reviews.title: Remote doesn't  last more than five minutes and crashed  a $170 drone that is now useless.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this hs100 drone cause it said very easy to use well that is partially true I got it all put together and took it out for initial test flight and I got it up and running flew with it in beginner mode flew out at the 30 foot range and when I hit the return home button 5 minutes into the flight and the remote started blinking red saying remote low battery lost connection and the drone tried flying back but flew directly into a shrub tree and now the left rear motor will not rotate. If the remote won't last more than 5 minutes then the whole drone is useless
customer_reviews.author: John Ward

customer_reviews.title: Far More for my money than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: A very pleasant surprise in very many ways: I have flown drones that have no GPS or stabilizing devices. They are very hard to fly. I researched better drones which had stabilizing and was ready to pay $1100 to $1500. Then I read the advertising copy for HolyStone HS100. AND THIS ONE WAS UNDER $300 !!! I COULDN'T BELIEVE IT! GPS, stabilizing, auto take offs and landings, automatic return home etc. I flew it perfectly the first time I tried it! I had a problem with charging the transmitter and I e-mailed HolyStone. Quick reply! Informative reply! Problem solved! Great service!
customer_reviews.author: James B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad at All
customer_reviews.text: Pros : Crazy stable even in strong wind....Very controllable....cool features and decent battery life. Cons : For me, unless I was on a golf course or wide open field the GPS wouldn't connect consistently. WiFi seemed to be effected by any surrounding obstructions. I would practice at my house and over it but the surrounding trees blocked the GPS even though the sky straight up is clear. I really liked it for the value and how well it flies but ended up returning it since the vast majority of my flying was in areas with surrounding trees.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robino

customer_reviews.title: Holy Stone GPS Drone
customer_reviews.text: I think this is an ideal drone for a beginner or even an experienced user who is not too concerned about the image quality. It is easy to use and takes excellent images, just not high resolution. It is reasonably priced and I am having a great time flying it every now and then. It is a good start for a beginner before you crash a pricier drone. I would say the camera is average and you lose connection once you fly too high or too far but aside from that the GPS is fairly accurate and lands exactly where it took off or within a few feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed F. Kilani, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: No it is not the best drone on the planet
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting a drone for a long time but couldn't afford one. Wanted quality. Thank you Holy Stone for making that possible. No it is not the best drone on the planet, but anyone expecting it to be, has not done very much research. However, it is a great drone, and I would recommend it for anyone who is learning to use a drone or shares it with their kids, or doesn't take great care of their stuff. The goods - cheap, easy to use. The bads - 12 min battery, 4 hour charge. I'll be excited to get my extra battery. Thanks again Holy Spirit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my boyfriend for Christmas. It was more than a little difficult to put together and get up and running! We ended up having his sister get it going because she is a bit more techs by and it took her the better part of the day to get it going—which it did once and only once, then the controller battery died and will no longer hold a charge... imagine giving someone a gift that doesn’t work well and then “dies”! The return window closed in January so we are hoping the manufacturer will help!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Defective when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great drone for the price, but out of the box the remote control would not charge up. It showed as fully charged, but when I tried to use it, it gave an error of insufficient battery charge. So I'm getting a replacement from Amazon. I'll update this review when I have a working drone.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S

customer_reviews.title: Great drone with lots of features for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband as a Christmas gift. I knew he always wanted a drone but would never shell out the money for one. I wanted a drone that was easy to fly with a good camera and that wouldn't get lost. This unit achieved my needs and then some. The drone flies almost by itself, takes excellent pictures, and returns home at the press of a button. And this thing can go high!!! My husband loves it. The only recommendation I have is to make sure you purchase extra batteries as the unit comes with only one and takes hours to charge. Other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: SAC

customer_reviews.title: My First drone over $50
customer_reviews.text: This is my first big drone over $50. It is a blast to fly. Setting it up is tricky at first. Looks like I am doing a ritual in the front yard until you take off beginner mode. Been flying for two days. As long as you do the ritual for gps. It will comeback home and hover any time you hit home button or the battery is low. Controls work good. Pics are good. Great price for what it is. It is cheap and easy enough to fly you can let friends or family learn to fly.
customer_reviews.author: Try anything

customer_reviews.title: Terrible drone.  Not enough power from the motors.
customer_reviews.text: I tried many times to fly this. Read the book many times. Made sure the battery was fully charged. Still, it would never get more than 7 feet off the ground and would not stay in the air more than 30 seconds to a minute. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jawsz124

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Constantly shows transmitter dead on app. Update: called customer service and hung up when I got voicemail. They actually called me right back and the person who called was able help me right then and there. Pretty impressed. The fix to my problem was pair the drone to transmitter. A step I forgot. Fingers crossed Second update: This thing is pretty awesome. I'm almost certain at this point that everyone who has the transmitter battery problem(myself included) are just forgetting to pair the drone to transmitter before calibrating compass. This is my first ever drone and I would highly recommend it to any beginner 16 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Doug cramer

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, who is not exactly "inclined" to advanced technology, but loved the idea of getting a drone. I searched for an affordable, easy-to-use drone. He absolutely loves it. Actually, we both do. We followed the included directions and also watched a few videos prior to operation. Once the weather cooperated, we took it outside for a test-drive. The camera is clear. We love the "follow-me" feature and especially the "return to home" feature. The quality and overall operation are as advertised and meet our expectations. I would say this is a great drone for beginners, and we will be purchasing the next generation drone from Holy Stone.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Foster

customer_reviews.title: Really cool drone!
customer_reviews.text: First drone and purchased it to follow me around on my boat and some aerial photos of the lake house. Have used it in the backyard playing with the follow me mode and appears to work well. Once I get more experienced, I will use it over the water. Installation instructions are well written. It was a little difficult for these "old eyes" to get the screws into the propellers, but that was more a function of age rather than difficulty. Battery has good life and cannot wait to venture out to more flights over the water.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Heslin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service for my experience .
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice drone.I had a problem with the battery life lasting 5-8 minutes when I got it.All the specs and reviews I had read said I would get 12-15 minutes per charge.I contacted Holy Stone just to find out if this was to be expected and I was completely surprised at the quick responses I received from them.They were fast in resolving my issue and went above and beyond.To be honest,I wasn’t expecting that.They replaced my battery and I couldn’t be more happy with the performance of this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Supurb Quadcopter
customer_reviews.text: The HS 100 did exactly what it was supposed to. I had a little bit of trouble with putting on the blades because the screws are so very tiny. Also had a bit of trouble with the smart phone, but I figured that out myself. All said, It took me an extra hour to figure out the screws and smartphone. It flys exactly as said with the calibration which is simple. I love this drone. I was thinking about the optional 1080 camera. Guess I'll get a little more time in before I buy. Purchase is my thought.
customer_reviews.author: Donald P. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only flew the drone 2x Each time I had to take about 30 minutes to re-calibrate it. Even then it kept telling me that I was out of battery power in the remote when in fact it charged all night, Had called the mfg and they said that it was calibrated when it left the mfg in China. I had not bothered calling them back telling them about the charg8ng issue, Was upset with this. Returned it with no problem. Will be looking at other manufactures.
customer_reviews.author: BARI CALAIS

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 day and that’s it
customer_reviews.text: 1) gps signal strong, everything is connected and synced, press the up button once message says ready to fly, camera moves back n forth, screen displays gps signal is weak and lights on drone blink. After a min, gps signal strong .....the cycle keeps repeating and the drone is happily sitting on its spot. Tried swapping batteries, restarting app, multiple recalibration, moving to different spot, nothing works. 2) btw, there is no phone number to call support. Cheers! Giving this junk back to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even a Grandpa Can Fly It
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired senior, and never have flown a drone or other RC aircraft. I am barely literate in all things computer or iPhone related. With the help of my more techno savy wife, and by looking at You Tube and reading the instruction manual, my first flight went off without a hitch. Flies itself. Set control speed to slow, and left default settings for height and distance to the beginner distances of 30 meters. Will use around my small western ranch. Ordered extra batteries.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun and cool product; you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions which were a little confusing but once everything was turned on, the unit did its own pairing and setup. We did the calibration pretty easily and the instant fly and land option is awesome. We snapped our first picture and it came out pretty good. Obviously, you can expect that there is a learning curve with flying a drone but using the controls lightly at first and you'll probably not have any accidents. It's pretty durable and comes with extra parts which is a thoughtful plus. The price is good considering what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Battery charge time/flight time
customer_reviews.text: This drone was returned because the battery charge time is basically overnight for about 10 minutes flight time. This is frustrating when one is trying to become familiar with the flight characteristics. For the price the Holy Stone appears well constructed and video is ok though without a fully gimbaled camera jerks with rapid sideward flight. If Holy Stone would solve this battery charge/flight time issue this would be worth the money. As it is presently, it is an exercise in frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzhugh B. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality from packaging on up
customer_reviews.text: I got this drone for my 11 year old son. Idk if it's the idea of an affordable drone with this many features or the fact that the company actually sends everything you would need that makes me happy I purchased this. It came with two tiny screwdrivers that you need and all the small parts plus extras. There's even a little flight log booklet/notepad. Flying it is so easy. The camera quality is pretty good. We were flying it near sunset and still got pretty good images. The landing is so smooth and now I have to buy my dad one. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Crown

customer_reviews.title: This drone works and hovers great. The return home is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This drone works and hovers great. The return home is amazing! However, within first flight I pressed a button called automatic return thinking it was home button. It shut off the drone and the landing gear and camera gear broke. Now I have a broken drone due to the fact I didn't read two lines in the packet of directions. I could definitely read everything in the directions before use. I am thinking there could be more issues in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Great for many ages, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this drone, it works great and the camera is surprisingly good. All features work as they should and I haven't had any issues with the camera, app, or controller. I would recommend this drone to everyone. It's not a drone for doing tricks or speed, however works great for filming and flight time is better then any other drone I have owned. I have only tried flying the drone 100 yards so far and was still responsive with the controller, but I did loose signal to my phone so I didn't know video quality until watching it on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris opsal

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, robust, precise flying and easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying the drone a lot. It's features are really helpful: return to home, automatic take-off and landing... It is very stable, that is, if you let go the control joysticks, the drone will stop at the location where it is and remain at that place. This allows during the learning process to get all back in place when you lost control, and take a deep breath. Also, it is essential for taking photos or filming, where you need to concentrate on that rather than controlling the drone. The drone is robust, operates pretty silently, and it is easy to control. I'm recommending it already to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fly. Great photos. Extremely pleased. Lots of great features
customer_reviews.text: This was my first " entry level" drone. After only about 20 minutes of flight time, I seem to have mastered this HS100. After pairing my iPhone, it actually walks you through what needs to be done on your iPhone screen each time you "pre-flight " . The photos are much better than I ever hoped for. I purchased this for real estate selling purposes. I am very pleased! The bottom line is: Easy to use and fly. Great photos. Extremely pleased. Lots of great features
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: It was too hard to learn
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband for Christmas. It came in quickly and well packaged. But my husband (who is a Maintenance Manager and Plant Engineer) couldn't figure out how to use it. Our nephew figured it out over our beach trip and it takes great movies. But it's too difficult to learn and the instructions that came with it were terrible. He had to get on Youtube and find a video because the instructions are worthless. It's an easy fix, to re-do the instructions and I would advise the company to do that.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.H. Nosenbook

customer_reviews.title: Great first drone!
customer_reviews.text: This was our first drone, and after a little trouble shooting on getting the phone linked up (had to turn phone on airplane mode), we were up and running. My only complaint is that sometimes at altitude it can be a little shaky when taking a video, but that may be something with all drones. Otherwise, great quality pictures and very easy to fly. It seemed like I got the advertised 18 minutes of flight time. Highly recommended for your first drone.
customer_reviews.author: Twolabs

customer_reviews.title: It would help if you packaged all of the parts before you ship it
customer_reviews.text: It was great all the way up until the part where I go to put the propellers on and there are none in there you would think they could just send me some propellers but now I have to return the entire package and re-by that stupid
customer_reviews.author: Mike Swallows

customer_reviews.title: Best Drone on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying this drone. For the price, it is one of the best ones I saw. I was not disappointed as it measured up to the positive reviews. Worked really well with my phone. Amazingly easy to fly. The camera took really good pictures. I will upgrade the memory card so I can get even better video. Excellent price. I think it is even better than the more expensive drones that are currently on the market. Very pleased and glad that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a drone beginner . I have never flown a drone before but I have to say that this product is very easy to fly and is easy to learn how to control . The device has propellor guards which also help balance the drone in high winds and prevent crashes for new users. I bought this drone for photography and the camera is very crisp and clear. I like that it has a gps feature to return to you if it gets out of range and the follow me feature which hovers and follows you as you walk . Make sure you have more than one battery for maximum flying time.
customer_reviews.author: Meganate

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say that their customer service isn't the best. Not horrible but could be better. As far as the drone goes for the price this thing is a smoking deal! You get all the bells and whistles that you would get with a 1,000$ drone except your only paying a fraction of the price. The only negative is the flight time off the battery is only around 15 minutes. Make sure you buy extra batteries if you are using this for a project or something.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly.
customer_reviews.text: Features and functions of the more expensive models. My husband wanted a ‘good drone’ for Christmas. He said take what I need out of savings. After reading reviews I decided on this one. I felt like I was taking a chance because it wasn’t expensive. He LOVES it and is outside with it every spare moment. He had no idea what I paid. He’s happy so wife is happy-that’s me!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Pool

customer_reviews.title: Very solid drone!
customer_reviews.text: Drone newbie, With this price, it performs very good, and the construction is much better than I expected. I hit trees a couple times, but the body was fine, well made. However, the controller is not so good as I hoped for, especially gimbals. Again I should not expect this to be like other expensive controllers, after all this is for the entry level. This uses foldable propellers, and it seems that they are more resistant against collisions. So far, after a month of use, only one blade was damaged after hitting metal wire fence.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Mouse

customer_reviews.title: did not refund all my money
customer_reviews.text: The day I purchased it and received it could not even use it the remote didn't even work but then went into the hospital and miss the 30-day cut off and they won't refund me the full amount
customer_reviews.author: Hemi57

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING
customer_reviews.text: I have ZERO experience flying a drone and was a bit reluctant anticipating my soon to be experience. I was pleasantly surprised!! I did have one problem and it was not a product problem but a ME problem LOL. I reached out to their customer support and my email was answered quickly and got me back on track within minutes and I was off the ground!!! Great customer service experience. Overall OUTSTANDING! a ton of fun. Quality wise ... Yes I crashed a few times as expected and NO damage!! and back in the air!
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: What a great toy for adults!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this drone for my hubby's 65th bday! He flew it for the first time yesterday and had a great time! The drone is far bigger an anticipated (which is a great thing) and there is definitely a learning curve (to be expected). He took a few pics and then videos of our home/property and the quality was absolutely amazing! Looking forward to many hours of flying time and entertaining all our adult friends! So far - happy happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: JSB

customer_reviews.title: nice drone
customer_reviews.text: i am a beginner pilot new to flying drones and i can say this drone is quite easy to fly be sure to always use the gps mode as it returns home if you get the drone out of control like anything it takes practice to get the hang of it but follow the instructions and you'll be flying in no time i had a few questions syncing the camera to my phone and customer support was great! i was impressed with the time they took making sure everything was working properly i give 5 stars to holy stone!
customer_reviews.author: darrin durrell

customer_reviews.title: Lied about free battery!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a bday gift to myself. Arrived earlier than expected. Couldn’t wait to try it. Yes the set up is tedious but the result I had were wonderful. Was a windy day but I couldn’t wait. This thing held position like a champ. Video was choppy but what can I expect on a windy day? Loved my first flight, looking forward to many more. Pro Seems easy so far to fly, camera is clear, auto hover and stop are amazing, so many more features to explore. Priced great considering features. Con Lengthy charge time, battery appears difficult to remove, set up is a little long as well Overall I’m extremely pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: W.Abler

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive drone packed full of features.
customer_reviews.text: If the controller shows low battery on the app, move the left stick up and down. This will sync the controller with the app and drone. Very easy to fly and use.Larger than many other drones, but a longer range than the ones that fit neatly in a backpack. With one button take off and landing, starting off is easy. Comes with plenty of spare parts, but get extra just in case you find trees/buildings/anything since there is no collision avoidance. It would be nice if Holy Stone made a case/backpack for this thing. Overall, great drone!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lerner

customer_reviews.title: I Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nothing works. Never can get the remote an drone to pair. An this haven calibration every time you want to fly. Is a pain in the butt. Second time I finally got to fly it I was landing it an about five feet from the ground it just turns off an crashes. Not happy with this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Walquisy

customer_reviews.title: What a great drone
customer_reviews.text: I'm so use to smaller drones that I could fly inside and this one is not for that. lol The auto take off is perfect lifting the drone to approx 5 ft and hovers (in GPS mode) until you make the next move, video is super clear, in gps mode the filming could get jumpy due to the gps keeping the drone in place but won't jump with the gps off. Pretty easy to get going after you do the compass dance which I must say has improved my pirouetting spins, lol. I registered my HS100 for 5 bucks & 2 years so I can't wait to take this puppy to the park.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dee

customer_reviews.title: Might as well get a dj phantom.
customer_reviews.text: For this price might as well she'll out $200 more and get a dj phantom. Why do drones have Auto takeoff and Landing auto return home GPS satellite positioning it's because you need computer assistance to fly them (fly by wire). So don't waste your money on any drone that doesn't at least have all of these features. That's my opinion. I've wasted alot of money on cheap drones.
customer_reviews.author: nmbenz

customer_reviews.title: Great drone, great service.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific new drone from Holy Stone. This drone does everything. I have multiple drones and the HS 100 will quickly become my favorite. Everything works as advertised. Perfect for still shots and videos in GPS mode. When you want to sport fly, turn off GPS function and fly with altitude hold and full acceleration which is adjustable. Also works well in a moderate breeze. Buy extra batteries because you will need them to keep flying. The Holy Stone staff is the best. Immediate response which competitors don’t offer. You will love this drone. As a fixed wing pilot, this drone satisfies my need to fly. A blast.
customer_reviews.author: William Dunnuck

customer_reviews.title: This drone is so easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: The drone is really fun to fly. It is so easy to fly with the help is altitude hold and has good stability. It has comparable features to the other higher end platforms, features like return home and lond range. I am not going to get into all the details, as other reviewers have done that quite nicely already. What I do want to convey is that the drone is fun, and takes really nice photos and video. I really enjoy flying it, and really like the controller, and the software. It does give nice long flight times which is 12 -15mins as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: SUNNY

customer_reviews.title: Great drone, very stable, great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a difference flying a drone with gps is, this drone flys great. The setup was fairly simple, once everything went together and all batteries charged, I took it out for its maiden flight. Everything synced well and with the one button take off, it was flying like I was a pro! Very stable, As a beginner, this drone made everything simple. The drone is easy to control without it flying off into the bushes. I look forward to many flights with this. Highly recommend this drone. Now to find a case for it....
customer_reviews.author: John Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone, value for money for Beginners and intermediate users.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a toy. This is a beginner drone for adults and older teens thinking of getting into the hobby, or for use in photography or videography. Great price, and value for money. It will take some wrecks and is fairly durable. This is a must if you are thinking of getting a more expensive DJI or other high end drone. Start with this one and learn to use it well before taking the next step.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is excellent.  Love the drone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice drone. It takes great video's and still shots. My husband was still getting used to it in the video. The camera angle can be adjusted so you don't see the bottom of the propellors. Operator error. We had an issue with the first battery, but they sent us a replacement immediately. No issues with that one. Then we had a hard landing and one of the motor kept giving us an error. Customer service again was phenomenal. Helped us work through the problem and the drone is up and flying again. My husband says it's easy to use. Calibrating it initially was a bit confusing, but we figured it out. Excellent drone and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money 💰
customer_reviews.text: This is a hunk of junk. It flies for 12 minutes and drops from the sky. (If it even makes it off of the ground . ) We sent it back. This is our second attempt at a drone. Sadly, it’s time to spend the big bucks to get a good one .
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: CONTROLLER BATTERY NOT HOLDING CHARGE. STILL CANNOT FLY THIS DRONE.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for low rating is that after 3-4 calls to Holystone's support, they still have not resolved the issue with a faulty controller. The drone and the 'controller' have been fully charged numerous times. Then when I take the drone out for a flight, the controller gives me an error that the battery is too low. So apparently the battery is not holding it's charge from the time I fully charge it until 5 minutes later when I try to fly the drone. I still have not had one flight on this product and I purchased it 2-3 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: LarryFB

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this drone on Christmas day and have been enjoying it ever since. All the features work great and it is build extremely well and I feel safe flying it. It can even take some crashes(I know from personal experiene). One of my favorite aspects of the drone is the return home feature. As long as you have a GPS connection it will always come back. The only criticism I have is the follow me mode. It requires you to take the entire remote with you which is a hassle. Overall though, great drone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ceci

customer_reviews.title: Transmitter battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these late last year. The first one had issues with the camera, but likely from crashes! However, the second one, while it worked ok, the transmitter would only charge up for 4 minutes max. I noted that another purchaser had the same problem with his two purchases. I don't want to spend another $30 for a transmitter, since this one is virtually new (never flown!) Very frustrating. I wish there were someway to replace a defective battery in the transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: fishless

customer_reviews.title: Everything as described but I'll have a learning curve
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase but I'll have to set aside a bit of time and wide open spaces to get the hang of this. In all fairness, I never liked playing video games and all the controls remind me of that. I wanted to be able to fly it right out of the box but there will be a learning curve. I was able to get it connected to my phone and at least lift straight up and then back down. The dog found the blades with his nose in the first 30 seconds of start up but both survived. We held him back the rest of the practice session. Will need many more practice sessions!
customer_reviews.author: docklc

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with product at all
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed the advertising was horrible the drone its self is just horrible battery doesn't last that long. Also doesn't fly as far as its advertised. Also it doesn't follow the you like its supposed to when in that mode. One thing that I'm every disappointed about is the fact that u can't fly it unless you have a cell phone with the app on it. Very very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first grownup drone and I just completed two flights, the first on beginner mode and the second with limits increased. I find it extremely easy and fun to fly! The little indoor toy drones are much more difficult to control compared to a real drone. Oh, and pay attention when inserting the SD card into the camera. It's possible to insert in the space above the slot and it will fall into the body of the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: TBD
customer_reviews.text: Flew one time, was impressed...then next time I try to take flight a get a low voltage error in app. Remote control won’t work. Charge for hours try again and same issue. Call their customer support, horrible. Broken English telling me to take my phone out of airplane mode...I say my phone hasn’t been and isn’t in airplane mode. I’m truly surprised at the high reviews for this company and product. Update11/13/19 A representative contacted me and has offered to replace the drone free of charge. I’m upgrading my review from one star to 3 stars. Will update further if product performs to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H Pettigrew III

customer_reviews.title: What to say...
customer_reviews.text: not impressed, it's a cheap overpriced toy, this drone works but can't be used for anything. Serious the best trainer drone is the syma x5c. All sorts of troubles with the HS100, returned and I bought a DJI Phantom 4 Pro...Nuff said
customer_reviews.author: Tree

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone!!!  Very user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome drone. Super easy to setup and operate. This is my first drone, and this one made for an enjoyable experience. The video was from my first flight,and everything worked flawlessly. I highly recommend this drone, especially if your starting out . The Holy Stone HS100 with 2k camera is awesome. It’s a lot of fun to fly. All the reviews and comments that I have read, about Holy Stone has been positive!
customer_reviews.author: gforce5

customer_reviews.title: Amazing experience for first-time drone owner
customer_reviews.text: Hello Holy Stone, My name is Robert and I am not considered very tech savvy and have not even held a drone before my purchase of the HS100 1080p drone. A friend of mine ordered it for me and I literally opened the box an hour ago. I have to tell you the directions were so easy to follow and my first flight was a breeze. A couple of vertical touch and goes and the next thing you know I was checking my roof tiles and lake front area. Wow. It was awesome, charging the battery ssh my wife can give it a go. Thanks for sure a clever product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing drone! It took about 10 minutes to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing drone! It took about 10 minutes to assemble and was flying in 15 minutes because they send the battery already charged. The controls make it so easy to fly especially with the auto take off and land, my 9 year old was flying it with no problem. If you follow the very well wrote out instructions there will be no problems at all. I had one question for customer service and I was honestly surprised how helpful and knowledgeable they were, they even gave me a follow up phone call to make sure everything worked out!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good entry to mid level drone with lots of good options.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first drone purchase. I took advantage of Prime day and pulled the trigger. I am very happy with this Holy Stone GPS FPV RC Drone HS100 with Camera Live Video 1080P HD and GPS Return Home Quadcopter. I had no problems with shipping and the setup was no problem. I've flown it about 8 times and had no mechanical issues. It worked as advertised, The auto return for low battery may have saved it on one flight (Good option for beginner). My only disappointment is the battery life, I can only get about 10 minutes of fling time and it takes over an hour to charge.
customer_reviews.author: chad r.

customer_reviews.title: To have a working quadcopter duh
customer_reviews.text: I was all excited to get your product in the mail but then when I got it and tried to charge the remote control it wouldn't charge according to your app I cannot get it to work in headless mode it's been nothing but a problem for me
customer_reviews.author: DAVID HEINICKE

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: The Drone is super well-built. It has quality written all over it. Comes with Lots of spare parts and customer service that can't be beat. I. I own 5 holy Stone and have had 10 to 15 other drones in the past and nothing surpasses the quality of these holy Stone drones. I got the hs100 because I mix videos and produce and wanted angles that were rare and hard to get. This drone is perfect for those tasks and more
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great after calibration
customer_reviews.text: After testing out a few drones, I am settling on this one. It’s a sturdy and reliable drone, with great features. Once calibration happens (which is a bit tricky to configure correctly the first time) it is great. Picture/video quality is strong. I wish the app wouldn’t change into Asian languages by itself though, as it makes it impossible to figure out what’s happening. The English translations are way off in the app, which makes calibration difficult. Overall, the drone itself, and remote, are great and I’m sticking with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott St Denis

customer_reviews.title: Experience is the Best Teacher
customer_reviews.text: A nice and professional unit. Appears well built and becomes easier to operate each time it is used. I do not consider it a toy as I am trying to learn how to operate it. Since I am new to this, I have to take one step at a time and I am fortunate to have a neighbor with drone experience to guide me. I recommend a novice to have someone with experience to get them started with this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Trooper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Company
customer_reviews.text: Company is amazing. If you are looking for a drone I recommend Holy Stone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money for a beginner drone enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning how to pilot this thing, but that's because I'm antediluvian, rather than being a problem with the actual drone. It's fantastic fun, being able to see my own head and roof! The controls are thoroughly explained, and the price point is such that it was a no-brainer to purchase it to see if more advanced drone aerial photography was up my alley. It just might be with some more airtime on this drone. Have no qualms about purchasing this one, it's the perfect beginner drone.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: First off the assembly of the properler is not easy. I had a hard time inserting the very ...
customer_reviews.text: First off the assembly of the properler is not easy. I had a hard time inserting the very small screws to the collar. The screws have to be in completely or the cup will not fit. Second I have a hard time programing my LG phone to pair with the drone. I thought the calibration is one time shot but actually you have to calibrate every time you fly it. I got a card that says "Get it now" I tried but not able to get the site at battery@holystone.com. Is this suppose to be a free battery? Right now I am still getting familiar with operation of the drone with LG phone on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Fun, great in wind, holds position pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty decent, had a camera issue and customer service was top notch and sent me a new one in days free of charge. They replied to my emails daily. I love the easy installation and removal of the battery, but it take a long time 4 hours to charge. This drone holds well in winds and is pretty quick. Return home mode is awesome and low battery return worked flawlessly. One issue I'm having when I record video, I only get a few minutes that actually recorded to the phone. Its beeping the whole time like its working, not sure what's going on there, maybe I will try the SD card.
customer_reviews.author: JARROD BLAKELEY

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drone very well made reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best beginner drones I've seen. Very reasonably priced has functions that more advanced drones have that cost 3 to 4 times what this one does. The only draw back is I haven't found a way to update firmware if there is one. It's a great drone to start out with and learn on before moving on to that high dollar drone you don't want to destroy. I've had mine for a year and still fly it with my other drones. June is the best she will help resolve your problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Drone will not let me use wifi., Aloso looses gps signal and craches
customer_reviews.text: I would like to replace this drone, because I.am not safe flying it anymore. On three flites the drone eather lost gps signal or gyro signal . starts to circle around than flys off left or right. cannot control drone at this pint. Please advise on next step. I cannot get any help at all from Holystone. Thank you Bob T>
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Free battery when leaving feedback! Also, a great drone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby at Xmas time 2018- he loves it, he lost 3 so far, that’s why I got this one because it comes home when battery is low and this one is much more sophisticated and for mature adults only! however he lost the paper work for a free battery when you leave feedback, there is a code your supposed to use, hopefully after reading this they may send a free battery and you may get a free one too!
customer_reviews.author: katgiz

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: This drone is very easy to fly. Only thing is it will only connect to a 5g phone and not a 2.4. So I can only use the remote. Can't figure out how to get the video from the sd card to my phone. The video doesn't show up when I move the sd card to my phone. But it is a blast to fly. Can't get it off beginners mode because it's a default setting and it won't connect to app through 2.4 It would definitely be a 5 star drone without these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mayle

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: My hs100 arrived yesterday, I have it all assembled and the battery is charged. Waiting own good weather to fly it for the first time. I had a question for Holy Stone support and they gave me an answer within 1 hour. That is good customer service. This drone looks like it's very high quality and I'm looking forward to flying it. This is not my first drone, I have two before this drone, but this is by far the best one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: 1st Drone
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone purchase after many hours of research. Using this HS so far has been a breeze, the functions included have made it basically idiot proof in using. I must say that indoor trials are not recommended, find an open area to get it going. The only problem that was encountered was pairing with my cellphone, this did not hinder flying the drone with the controller however. I am still in the process of learning and can see myself having some long practice sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Trini 2d bone

customer_reviews.title: Handles Well, but NO Stunts, Camera Quality Lacking.
customer_reviews.text: Good drone for beginners as it holds its position through GPS. Return home is accurate. Auto takeoff and landing works well. Be aware, does not do stunts so may get pretty boring before 10 min battery life ends. Also, camera does not capture details very well; grainy and distorted. Only comes with one battery which is pretty lame; get 10 minutes air time before must return for three hour refueling.
customer_reviews.author: KingD

customer_reviews.title: Great for the novice Drone flyer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Drone as a Christmas present for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it! Overall it is a great the first time Drone user. Seems like a well built product. I reached out to Holy Stone regarding extra batteries and they answered within seconds. This is a great company with fantastic customer service. YouTube videos also helped out when trying to take the first flight. After that was watched he was flying in no time. Excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

product_meta.title: Holy Stone 2K GPS FPV RC Drone HS100 with HD Camera Live Video and GPS Return Home, Large Quadcopter with Adjustable Wide-Angle Camera, Follow Me, Altitude Hold, 18 Minutes Flight, Long Control Range
feature_bullets: The Largest & Wind-Resistant: Large body and powerful motors keep drone hovering stably in wind. Headless Mode, Altitude Hold and One Key Takeoff and Landing for easier operation. Perfect for beginners. Size 16.9*16.9*6.9 IN

2K Optimized 120° FOV FPV 5GHz Wi-Fi Camera: 90° Adjustable angle, captures high-quality video and aerial photos. You can enjoy the Real-Time Viewing right from your remote control. Ideal selfie done, catching every moment of your vacation from a birds-eye perspective. 5GHz WIFI enables clearer and farther FPV images transmission

Easy to Assemble & Carry: The foldable propellers are pre-assembled. Just insert camera, landing gears and battery. Then, get it take off. Besides, the foldable propellers makes it easy to keep the drone or take it out.

GPS Assisted Flight: Provides you with accurate positioning details of your drone. Built in Return-to-Home (RTH) function for safer fly, the drone will automatically return to home precisely when its battery is low or the signal is weak when flying out of range, never worrying about losing the drone. Follow Me Mode: The drone will automatically follows and captures you wherever you move. Keeping you in the frame at all times, easier to get complex shots, provides hands-free flying and selfie

Flying Time Up to 18 Mins / Longer Control Distance: Capacity of 3500mAh high performance battery and reaching up to 1968FT control distance giving you a more extensive flight experience. BLADES ARE UNDER THE FOAM BOX

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,012 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
